overview_of_class: Comparative Politics covers a range of issues spanning the entire globe (including the US, even if it is treated as a separate field). This seminar will expose students to some of the foundational works in Comparative. The concepts, theories, and analyses contained in these readings will provide essential building blocks for students to pursue further reading on their own and in other courses in comparative politics and political economy.
name: Contemporary Theory and Research in Comparative Politics
subject: POLI_SCI
